Uses of Interface
com.github.wuic.exception.ErrorCode

  • Packages that use ErrorCode 
    Package Description
    com.github.wuic.exception
    This package contains all common exceptions which could be thrown by WUIC.
    com.github.wuic.exception.wrapper
    This packages defines exceptions which wrap or represent a particular and common exception.
    com.github.wuic.exception.xml
    This package contains all exceptions related to wuic.xml path.

    • Uses of ErrorCode in com.github.wuic.exception

      Classes in com.github.wuic.exception that implement ErrorCode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BuilderPropertyNotSupportedException
      This exception is thrown when a ObjectBuilder does not support a specified property.
      static class  BuilderPropertyNotSupportedException.Adapter
      Adapter class for generic purpose.
      class  NutNotFoundException
      Indicates that a a nut for a particular heap has not been found.
      class  PollingOperationNotSupportedException
      Indicates that the NutDao polling feature method is not supported by a particular implementation.
      class  SaveOperationNotSupportedException
      Indicates that the NutDao.save(com.github.wuic.nut.Nut) method is not supported by a particular implementation.
      class  StaticWorkflowNotFoundException
      Thrown when a workflow is retrieved with the StaticEngine and when its associated file has not been found in classpath.
      class  UnableToInstantiateException
      Thrown when a class could not be instantiated.
      class  WorkflowNotFoundException
      Indicates that a Workflow has not been found.
      class  WorkflowTemplateNotFoundException
      Thrown when a workflow references a template that does not exists.
      class  WuicException
      This exception is a global checked exception thrown by WUIC.
      class  WuicRuntimeException
      This exception is a global unchecked exception thrown by WUIC.

    • Uses of ErrorCode in com.github.wuic.exception.wrapper

      Classes in com.github.wuic.exception.wrapper that implement ErrorCode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BadArgumentException
      Wraps any IllegalArgumentException thrown by WUIC.
      class  BadClassException
      Thrown when a type is not an instance of an expected class.
      class  StreamException
      Represents an errors which usually occurs when a IO issue is raised.

    • Uses of ErrorCode in com.github.wuic.exception.xml

      Classes in com.github.wuic.exception.xml that implement ErrorCode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WuicXmlBadReferenceException
      Thrown when an attribute a value that does not references a value known by the current context.
      class  WuicXmlBadReferenceToDaoBuilderException
      Thrown when an attribute a value that does not references a value known by the current context.
      class  WuicXmlBadTypeOfValueException
      Thrown when a value of an element is not a type of an expected class in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlException
      Thrown when an error related the the wuic.xml path occurs.
      class  WuicXmlMissingConfigurationElementException
      Thrown when an element is not properly defined for a configuration in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoAttributeException
      Thrown when an attribute is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoClassAttributeException
      Thrown when an class is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoConfigurationIdAttributeException
      Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for a configuration in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoIdAttributeException
      Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoNutDaoBuilderClassAttributeException
      Thrown when a class is not properly defined for a nut dao builder in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlNoNutDaoBuilderIdAttributeException
      Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for a nut DAO builder in wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlReadException
      A 'WuicXmlReadException' is a default exception thrown when a wuic.xml path could not be read properly.
      class  WuicXmlUnableToInstantiateException
      Thrown when a class could not be instantiated in the wuic.xml path.
      class  WuicXmlWorkflowIdentifierException
      Thrown a workflow does not reference one and only one of both 'idPrefix' and 'id' attributes.
      class  WuicXmlWrappedErrorCodeException
      Simple WuicXmlException based on a delegated ErrorCode.
      Constructors in com.github.wuic.exception.xml with parameters of type ErrorCode 
      Constructor and Description
      WuicXmlWrappedErrorCodeException(ErrorCode ec)
      Builds a new exception based on a detailed message.
